clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Stevia Extract on Postprandial Glucose Response and Satiety in Overweight and Obese Adults: A Three-arm Crossover Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to assess the effect of stevia extract on postprandial glucose and insulin levels in overweight and obese adults when compared to sugar and water.

detailed_description.textblock: The study is a three-arm crossover trial involving participants attending the Lab on 3 different occasions (separated by 3-5 day washout period), where they will be administered water, sugar solution (65g), water and stevia extract (5g) solution. The solution will be followed by a consumption of a fixed meal (after 30 minutes). Breakfast will be standardised. Capillary blood glucose will be collected every 30 min until 2 hours post meal. Venous blood samples will be collected before the intake of the solution and at 2 hours after meal intake.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Capillary blood glucose will be measured two hours after the administration of a fixed meal.
primary_outcome.description: Change in glucose levels two hours after the administration of a fixed meal

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Postprandial insulin levels will be measured two hours of the administration of a fixed meal
secondary_outcome.description: Change in postprandial insulin levels two hours after the administration of a fixed meal

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the curve (AUC) for glucose
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Capillary blood glucose levels will be collected 6 times on each visit before the intake of the solution until 2 hours post lunch
secondary_outcome.description: Changes in AUC for glucose throughout the intervention

secondary_outcome.time_frame: VAS will be collected 6 times on each visit before the intake of the solution until 2 hours post lunch.

arm_group.description: 250 ml of water mixed with 1g of citric acid.
65g of sugar dissolved in 250ml of water
5g of stevia dissolved in 250ml of water

intervention.description: Participants will receive a solution of stevia before being administered a fixed meal (lunch). Glucose and insulin levels, and Visual analogue scale data will be collected.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 18-65 years
- BMI 27-40 Kg/m2
- Males and females
Exclusion Criteria:
